Summary: Driving Home From Austin Tx to San Antonio Tx-listening to music all of a sudden i c this huge silvery shiny spinning cloud then a Huge Disc Appeared--I was Amazed not Scared Happy felt like they were tryin to Communicate was So Divine -I Felt like Family
divs: Sighting DetailsA Sudden Appearance of a Glowing Object apppeared amidst the Clouds as if tyring to say Hello what was a spinning small silvery blue sphere became a huge Silver Disc--i could make out square like windows and just really became aware of a galactic connection of divinity-i had a funny feeling in my stomach like someone was tickling me for bout a month or two aftewards i still feel it every now and then--i tried to c if anyone else had seen it on the road but no-one seemed to notice i asked it to come back and not to leave and that i welcomed them--they transmitted to me love i felt it--i felt a sudden awareness of a connection--i do believe i was dematerialized because the week after this happened i went back to that same area and I remember losing time i didnt know where i was or who i was i was a complete zombie--I litterally felt as if i was unfolding-you know like when a piece of aluminum foil unfolds when you crush it---i ran to the shoe store and i was goin to ask them to call the police becuz i didnt know who i was--so yes i just felt a light come through me as i stepped on a blue square on the pavement this light came thru and i went to the stores did what i had to do but i was not on earth--i came from somewhere else--I was Teleported--although i didnt like the feeling if it leads me to divine conssciousness so be it! In conclusion they have contacted me and i have accepted them now I see them all the time and i Love them and the Love me-and I am ready to become and enter into the Divine Galactic Community--pure and simple with Love!!
